name: Niak_stability_rest
description: BASC pipeline as available in Niak. More information at https://github.com/SIMEXP/niak

inputs.name: Output folder name
inputs.description: The name of the output folder where results will be produced.

inputs.name: PSOM max queued
inputs.description: Number of workers to use in PSOM. This is the maximum number of computing nodes that the pipeline will use. It should be adjusted depending on the number of subjects to be processed. Use the default value if you don't know how to set this parameter.

inputs.name: Minimum number of volume
inputs.description: The minimum number of volumes for an fMRI dataset to be included. This option is useful when scrubbing is used, and the resulting time series may be too short.

inputs.name: Minimum xcorr score
inputs.description: The minimum xcorr score for an fMRI dataset to be included. This metric is a tool for quality control which assess the quality of non-linear coregistration of functional images in stereotaxic space. Manual inspection of the values during QC is necessary to properly set this threshold.

inputs.name: Minimum xcorr score
inputs.description: The minimum xcorr score for an fMRI dataset to be included. This metric is a tool for quality control which assess the quality of non-linear coregistration of the anatomical image in stereotaxic space. Manual inspection of the values during QC is necessary to properly set this threshold.

inputs.name: Exclude Subject
inputs.description: If subjects have to be excluded and were not caught by the quality control metrics, it is possible to manually specify their IDs here.

inputs.name: Region growing threshold size
inputs.description: Size of the regions, when they stop growing. A threshold of 1000 mm3 (default) will give about 1000 regions on the grey matter.

inputs.name: Grid scale
inputs.description: search for stable clusters in a given range

inputs.name: Individual bootstrap samples
inputs.description: Number of bootstrap samples at the individual level.

inputs.name: Group bootstrap samples
inputs.description: Number of bootstrap samples at the group level.

inputs.name: Flag ind
inputs.description: Generate maps/time series at the individual level.

inputs.name: Flag mixed
inputs.description: Generate maps/time series at the mixed level (group-level networks mixed with individual stability matrices).

inputs.name: Flag group
inputs.description: Generate maps/time series at the group level

output-files.name: Output folder
output-files.description: A folder containing the output files.
